name: harf

stmt.origin: fmpti(hs0, char, universe, con0, crab(hs1, con0, wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, cv(hs0))))
stmt.pretty: fmpti(hs0, char, universe, con0, { hs1 ∈ On | hs1[≼]hs0 })

body.origin:
|- wf(char, universe, con0)
-| wceq(char, cmpt(hs0, universe, crab(hs1, con0, wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, cv(hs0)))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(crab(hs1, con0, wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, cv(hs0))), con0))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, con0)
body.pretty:
⊢ (har : 𝕌 → On)
⊣ har =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs1 ∈ On | hs1[≼]hs0 })
⊣ (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 → { hs1 ∈ On | hs1[≼]hs0 } ∈ On)
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, On)
